title: html/template: runtime error: slice bounds out of range (2)
body:
The following program crashes with panic:
```go
package main

import (
	"html/template"
	"io/ioutil"
)

func main() {
	t, err := template.New("foo").Parse(string(data))
	if err != nil {
		return
	}
	t.Execute(ioutil.Discard, nil)
}

var data = "<style>\xbbﬂ§2Dq\x8e%5\xf1\x945\xf1\x94</style>"
```
